name: Warhaven
summary:
Warhaven is a brand new 16vs16 third person combat action game created by the minds behind 'Durango: Wild Lands' and 'Vindictus'.

Choose among a diverse roster of melee-weapon and magic-based combatants to storm battlegrounds as you see fit. Transform into powerful heroes called Immortals to wield supernatural skill sets, and experience team-based sword-and-magic gameplay like never before.
